evs.data
Class DataSource

java.lang.Object
  evs.data.DataSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileArrayDataSource, FileDataSource
public abstract class DataSource
extends java.lang.Object

A simple wrapper class for a data location, such as a file data location. The data location should be set on construction of an object from a concrete subclass. A data object should not contain a null data source.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

          The data source, set on construction of a concrete subclass.
